findings.title: Unprotected function setAvailableTokensToTransfer
findings.description: The function setAvailableTokensToTransfer does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it and potentially manipulate the tokensToSend mapping.

findings.title: Unsecured initialization in initVesting function
findings.description: The initVesting function does not properly secure its initialization, potentially leading to unauthorized access or data manipulation.

findings.title: Inadequate test coverage for Vesting.sol
findings.description: The audit report does not provide specific details about this finding.
